body_html:
Are there any news on this?
A 4D operation would be a really nice feature. Especially now that more and more people from other fields, where 4D (3D + time) is the common use case (i.e. physics), are jumping in on deep learning.
Even if the n-dimensional generalization is not easily implementable, I think a separate conv4d would be very helpful.

body:
Are there any news on this?
A 4D operation would be a really nice feature. Especially now that more and more people from other fields, where 4D (3D + time)  is the common use case (i.e. physics), are jumping in on deep learning.
Even if the n-dimensional generalization is not easily implementable, I think a separate conv4d would be very helpful.
